title: The Power Eater
description: Morbidius Ultimatum's diabolical pleasure is his collection of the last member of each species on earth. But he has lost patience and is making plans to complete his collection. He wants to add his most sought-after specimens: the panda bear, the Bengal tiger and humans! All that stands in his way of total annihilation of the earth are two children, Chilli and Ty. But they first have to overcome their darkest fear. And fear is what makes them weak and Morbidius strong. Can they win the race against time and destroy Morbidius's dark heart?
author: Diane van der Westhuizen
